note: Lecturer at the Center for Biological and Health Sciences, Universidade do Estado do Pará (UEPA). I teach Nursing courses in the area of Morphofunctionals. I am interested in Climate Change, Health and Environment, Climate Effects on Human Health, and the future (if there is one)...
